1666440.name: RPG Maker MV - Original Character Contest Winners Season 3
1666440.description:
Brand New Free DLC from the top selected winners of our third RPG Maker Original Character Contest! This one includes Japanese forum winners as well.

With the Season 3 pack, you get 21 new characters from minds of RPGMakerWeb and Tkool community members!

Grab them for free, and discover the hero, villain, or maybe just a side character for your next game! Just be sure to credit all the amazing creators.


Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series only
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1666440.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
